news_entries.title: New Website in the Works
news_entries.entry:
I'm working on a new website from the ground up that is updated by the guild logs.
http://mynameis7.pythonanywhere.com/

It's still in the works but it has a full and updated listing of the guild members.  I hope to allow you guys to login to view the website in the future.

There is an IRC chat for us as well.

news_entries.title: Guild Lottery Winners 12/5/2015
news_entries.entry:
In a vicious 3 way tie in a rock paper scissors game of the ages, Smalltownguy, Chaosthegreat, and Final-Knight all won 700 CE for the guild meeting event!

Congratulations (After numerous failed main event attempts of jelly soccer).

news_entries.title: Guild Meeting: 12/5/15
news_entries.entry:
The guild will be converging on December 5th at 2:00PM EDT to organize runs in PvE and PvP among other guild oriented guild that can't accomplished with scattered schedules. Due to this event, our guild's monthly lottery will be pushed back to this date for better distribution of prizes. Discuss, play, maybe win something?

Enjoy the picture because I ran out of creativity a while back. Now [url=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=w_TXlm3aj-4]rise to sing the guild's theme song.[/url]

news_entries.title: Guild Lottery Winners!: 10/31/15
news_entries.entry:
I'd say Happy Halloween but I ate all the candy, so here's some free stuff instead. Congrats to our October lottery winners!

If your name is listed below, please pay close attention to your mailbox in the next few days.

Skorchd - Shadow Key x1

Chaosthegreat - 1,000 Energy

Banjolin - 25x Spark of Life

El-Puno-Fuerte - 2x Weapon Slot Upgrades

Aeskau - 2x Trinket Slot Upgrades

If you don't see you name, don't worry! Make sure you stick around at the end of next month. We'll be repeating this event next month with even better prizes. If you have any ideas of what you'd like to see then let us know in the comments. General feedback or congrats to the winners are also welcome.

news_entries.title: Guild PSA: Dark Harvest 2015
news_entries.entry:
Honestly, I just got bored and wanted to make another news page.

On that note, Dark Harvest 2015 has arrived as of yesterday along with no noticeable changes to the roots of this event. The goal of this PSA is to ask that all available active members be aware of the event and help those interested in hunting/farming the game for prizes they're interested in. 

Basic things, you can do to help:
[list]
[*]Invite members to farm with you.
[*]Notify the chat or interested members that you've located a Punkin King Lair.
[*]Trading items of interest (Boxes, Punkin Sprouts. Hallow items)

[/list]

news_entries.title: Guild Lottery Winners!: 9/30/15
news_entries.entry:
Congratulations to our active members who were randomly chosen for our monthly lottery!

Due to a shortage of players that meet the previous drawing criteria, the players who were logged in through the month of September are eligible for this drawing to add more potential winners. Previous winners will not be eligible for this month, but can win next month. 

If your name is listed below, please pay close attention to your mailbox in the next few days.

Fruitalicious - Permafroster Crafting Kit: 1x Freezing Pulsar Gun, 1x Frozen Pulsar Recipe, 1x Permafroster Recipe, 3x Elite Orbs of Alchemy 

Bobololo - Wildfire Crafting Kit: 1x Flaming Pulsar Gun, 1x Blazing Pulsar Recipe, 1x Wildfire Recipe, 3x Elite Orbs of Alchemy 

Final Knight - 1x Shadow Key

Thalcon - 2x Weapon Slot Upgrades

Acalodar - 2x Trinket Slot Upgrades

If you don't see you name, don't worry! Make sure you stick around at the end of next month. We'll be repeating this event next month with even better prizes. If you have any ideas of what you'd like to see then let us know in the comments. General feedback or congrats to the winners are also welcome.

news_entries.title: Guild Lottery Winners!
news_entries.entry:
Congratulations to our active members who were randomly chosen for our monthly lottery! 

Candidates are chosen out of a roster of players who are active 7 days within the date of the drawing. 
If your name is listed below, please pay close attention to your mailbox in the next few days. If your prize is at the luxury of your choice, please mail me a message telling me your choice.

Pulsar  x 2 (2* Normal Damage Handgun) - Senpai-Ember
Shadow Driver (4* Shadow Damage Alchemer) - Nitchy
Elemental Armor + Hood (3* Elemental based armor) - Ghosteh-Unknown
Black Kat Hood (3* Shadow based helmet) - Kurayami-No-Hikari
Elite Trueshot Module (5* Trinket) - Smalltownguy
Trinket/Weapon Slot (Your choice) - Fainr-II
Grim Buster Handgun (3* Shadow Tortogun) - Tehbomb
Promotion Prize Box 1x (Blazing) - Snapcrackledeath
Silver Key 1x with all lockboxes (Copper - Platnium) - Alephred

If you don't see you name, don't worry! Make sure you stick around at the end of next month. We'll be repeating this event next month with even better prizes. If you have any ideas of what you'd like to see then let us know in the comments. General feedback or congrats to the winners are also welcome. (Friendly reminder that Purepwn is not made of money but secretly wishes he was.)

news_entries.title: Rise of Knights
news_entries.entry:
Do you like Spiral Knights?
Do you have a smartphone or tablet?

Then you might be interested in the fact that SEGA has announced/released the Spiral Knights' first mobile spin off: Rise of Knights

Check the source for a video with 15 minutes of game play footage.

Source: http://segabits.com/blog/2015/07/19/sega-releases-new-spiral-knights-spin-off-rise-of-knights/

Discussion: http://forums.spiralknights.com/en/node/111080
